scripts.lint: (echo Linting... && markdownlint-cli2  '*.md' && echo Lint passed.) || (echo Lint failed! Please review and fix errors. && exit 1)
scripts.spellcheck: (spellchecker --plugins spell indefinite-article repeated-words syntax-urls --dictionaries dictionary/dictionary.txt --files '*.md'  && echo Spellcheck passed.) || (echo Spellcheck failed! Please review and fix errors/add words to dictionary as needed. && exit 1)
